Code 
sz_names <- mpsz$SUBZONE_C
Code 
colnames(dist) <- paste0(sz_names)
rownames(dist) <- paste0(sz_names)
Code 
distPair <- melt(dist) %>%
  rename(dist = value)

                        50, distPair$dist)

distPair <- distPair %>%
  rename(orig = Var1,
         dest = Var2)
Code 
write_rds(distPair, "data/lesson10/rds/distPair.rds")
Code 
distPair <- read_rds("data/lesson10/rds/distPair.rds")
Code 
od_data_fii <- read_rds("data/lesson10/od_data_fii.rds")
Code 
flow_data <- od_data_fii %>%
  group_by(ORIGIN_SZ, DESTIN_SZ) %>% 
  summarize(TRIPS = sum(MORNING_PEAK)) 
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'ORIGIN_SZ'. You can override using the
`.groups` argument.
Code

Code 
flow_data$FlowNoIntra <- ifelse(
  flow_data$ORIGIN_SZ == flow_data$DESTIN_SZ, 
  0, flow_data$TRIPS)
flow_data$offset <- ifelse(
  flow_data$ORIGIN_SZ == flow_data$DESTIN_SZ, 
  0.000001, 1)
Code 
flow_data$ORIGIN_SZ <- as.factor(flow_data$ORIGIN_SZ)
flow_data$DESTIN_SZ <- as.factor(flow_data$DESTIN_SZ)
Code 
flow_data1 <- flow_data %>%
  left_join (distPair,
             by = c("ORIGIN_SZ" = "orig",
                    "DESTIN_SZ" = "dest"))
Code 
pop <- read_csv("data/lesson10/aspatial/pop.csv")
Rows: 332 Columns: 5
â”€â”€ Column specification â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
Delimiter: ","
chr (2): PA, SZ
dbl (3): AGE7_12, AGE13_24, AGE25_64

â„¹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
â„¹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
Code 
pop <- pop %>%
  left_join(mpsz,
            by = c("PA" = "PLN_AREA_N",
                   "SZ" = "SUBZONE_N")) %>%
  select(1:6) %>%
  rename(SZ_NAME = SZ,
         SZ = SUBZONE_C)
Code 
flow_data1 <- flow_data1 %>%
  left_join(pop,
            by = c(ORIGIN_SZ = "SZ")) %>%
  rename(ORIGIN_AGE7_12 = AGE7_12,
         ORIGIN_AGE13_24 = AGE13_24,
         ORIGIN_AGE25_64 = AGE25_64) %>%
  select(-c(PA, SZ_NAME))
Code 
flow_data1 <- flow_data1 %>%
  left_join(pop,
            by = c(DESTIN_SZ = "SZ")) %>%
  rename(DESTIN_AGE7_12 = AGE7_12,
         DESTIN_AGE13_24 = AGE13_24,
         DESTIN_AGE25_64 = AGE25_64) %>%
  select(-c(PA, SZ_NAME))
Code 
write_rds(flow_data1, "data/lesson10/rds/flow_data_6-9.rds")
